ModMetaData.name: [KYD] JoyKind: Ambrosia
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>JoyKind: Ambrosia</size>
Adds Ambrosia as its own JoyKind, with a new JoyGiver, to separate ambrosia as a recreation item from drugs. Compatible with any mod that adds ambrosia, provided their chemical contains the word "Ambrosia".
